00050     ///////////////////////////////////
00051     // ActorBase class fuctions
00052     ActorBase::ActorBase (String name, String file, String group, World* _World)
00053     {
00054         this->GameWorld = _World;
00055         this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00056         this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00057         this->MotionState = new internal::PhysMotionState(this->node);
00058         this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00059         this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00060     }
00061 
00062     ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00063     {
00064         delete MotionState;
00065         delete Shape;
00066     }
00067 
00068     ///////////////////////////////////
00069     // ActorBase Private misc functions
00070     btTriangleMesh* ActorBase::CreateTrimesh()
00071     {
00072         // Get the mesh from the entity
00073         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00074 
00075         // Get the submesh and associated data
00076         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00077         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00078         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00079 
00080         // Get the position element
00081         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00082 
00083         // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00084         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00085 
00086         // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00087         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00088 
00089         // Get the number of triangles
00090         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00091 
00092         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00093         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00094         unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00095 
00096         // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00097         unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00098         float* pReal = NULL;
00099         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00100         {
00101             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00102             Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00103             vertices[j] = pt;
00104         }
00105         vBuffer->unlock();
00106         size_t index_offset = 0;
00107         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00108 
00109         // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00110         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00111         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00112 
00113         if (use32bitindexes)
00114         {
00115             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00116             {
00117                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00118             }
00119         }
00120         else
00121         {
00122             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00123             {
00124                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00125             }
00126         }
00127         iBuffer->unlock();
00128 
00129         // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00130 
00131         // The Bullet triangle mesh
00132         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00133 
00134         // Setup the tri mesh
00135         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00136         int i=0;
00137 
00138         // For every triangle
00139         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00140         {
00141             // Set each vertex
00142             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00143             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00144             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00145 
00146             // Add it into the trimesh
00147             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00148 
00149             // Increase index count
00150             i+=3;
00151         }
00152         delete[] vertices;
00153         delete[] indices;
00154 
00155         return trimesh;
00156     }

00162     {
00163         this->entity = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createEntity(name, file, group);
00164     }

00166     void ActorBase::CreateSceneNode ()
00167     {
00168         this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00169     }

00172     // ActorBase Private Location Functions
00173 
00174     void ActorBase::SetOgreLocation (Vector3 Location)
00175     {
00176         this->node->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00177     }
00178 
00179     Vector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation()
00180     {
00181         Vector3 temp;
00182         temp.ExtractOgreVector3(this->node->getPosition());
00183         return temp;
00184     }
00185 
00186     void ActorBase::SetBulletLocation (Vector3 Location)
00187     {
00188         //btTransform* temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00189         this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00190     }
00191 
00192     Vector3 ActorBase::GetBulletLocation()
00193     {
00194         Vector3 temp;
00195         btTransform trans = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00196         temp.ExtractBulletVector3(trans.getOrigin());
00197         return temp;
00198     }

00204     {

00207 
00208     void ActorBase::SetBulletOrientation (Quaternion Rotation)
00209     {
00210         btTransform temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00211         temp.setRotation(Rotation.GetBulletQuaternion());
00212     }

00218     {

00223     void ActorBase::SetLocation (Vector3 Place)
00224     {
00225         this->SetBulletLocation(Place);
00226         this->SetOgreLocation(Place);
00227     }

00229     Vector3 ActorBase::GetLocation()
00230     {
00231         return this->GetBulletLocation();
00232     }

00259     ///////////////////////////////////
00260     // ActorBase Public Misc Functions
00261 
00262     void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00263     {
00264         Vector3 temp;
00265         //temp.ExtractBulletVector3(this->MotionState->initposition.getOrigin());
00266         temp = GetBulletLocation();
00267         this->node->setPosition(temp.GetOgreVector3());
00268         this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00269     }

00274     {

00276         this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(x);
00277     }

00280     {

00283     }
